TopicTitle: Orbit change after wraping in RSS/RO v 1.4.5

Articles.Content:
I got RO and RSS and some other mods, then whenever i send a probe on a nice trajectory to moon, before timewrap things are fine, after timewrap the orbit calculations are off, encounter is gone.

Anyone know a fix for this?

Edited January 20, 2019 by Xd the great
